body:
# Hibari API

Work in progress API backend for extra Kitsu statistics for [Hibari](https://github.com/wopian/hibari)

Initially developed as part of the *Web Services* module at Bucks New University

## Installation

TODO: Write installation instructions here

## Usage

TODO: Write usage instructions here

SSL:
```bash
crystal build --release src/api.cr
./api --ssl --ssl-key-file your_key_file --ssl-cert-file your_cert_file
```
## Development

### External Dependencies

- sqlite3 (libsqlite3-dev)

### Commands

#### Install Shards

```shell
crystal deps
```

#### Start Dev Server

```shell
crystal src/api.cr
```

#### Run Tests

```shell
crystal spec
```

#### Update Documentation

```shell
crystal docs
```

#### Build Server

```shell
crystal build src/api.cr --release
./api
```

## Contributing

1. [Fork it](https://github.com/wopian/hibari-api/fork)
2. Create your feature branch (`git checkout -b feat/myFeature`)
3. Commit your changes (`git commit -am 'feat: add my feature'`)
4. Push to the branch (`git push origin feat/myFeature`)
5. Create a Pull Request

## Contributors

- [wopian](https://github.com/wopian) James Harris - creator, maintainer

constants.name: HEADERS
constants.value: {"Content-Type" => JsonAPI::CONTENT_TYPE, "Strict-Transport-Security" => "max-age=63072000; includeSubDomains; preload", "Content-Security-Policy" => "default-src 'none'", "Cache-Control" => "public, max-age=900, s-maxage=900", "X-Frame-Options" => "SAMEORIGIN", "X-XSS-Protection" => "1; mode=block", "X-Content-Type-Options" => "nosniff", "Referrer-Policy" => "strict-origin-when-cross-origin"}
constants.doc: Response headers for the Hibari API

types.name: Errors
types.doc:
Error endpoints for the Hibari API.

Each error returns a JSON:API formatted error response

instance_methods.name: set_error_headers
instance_methods.doc:
Sets the response headers for each error endpoint

TODO: Find why before_all doesn't apply to error endpoints
instance_methods.summary: Sets the response headers for each error endpoint

instance_methods.name: construct_data
instance_methods.summary: Creates the data array of the JSON:API response

def.name: construct_data
def.body:
json.field("data") do
  json.array do
    rs.each do
      construct_resource(json, col_names, rs)
    end
  end
end

instance_methods.name: construct_field
instance_methods.doc:
Creates the fields of JSON:API responses

Returns the following JSON structures:

```json
"key": "value"
```

```json
"key": [ "value" ]
```

def.name: construct_field
def.body:
case value
when Bytes
  json.field(col) do
    json.array do
      value.each do |e|
        json.scalar(e)
      end
    end
  end
when NotSupported
else
  json.field(col) do
    value.to_json(json)
  end
end

instance_methods.name: construct_resource
instance_methods.doc:
Creates the JSON:API resource object

Returns the following JSON structure:

```json
{
  "col_name": "value",
  ...
}
```

def.name: construct_resource
def.body:
json.object do
  col_names.each do |col|
    construct_field(json, col, rs.read)
  end
end

def.name: error
def.body: ({errors: [{title: title, detail: detail, status: status, code: status}]}).to_json

def.name: response
def.body:
JSON.build do |json|
  json.object do
    construct_data(json, col_names, rs)
  end
end

def.name: get
def.body:
uri = URI.parse(BASE_URL + resource)
uri.query = params.to_s
response = HTTP::Client.get(uri, headers: HTTP::Headers {"Content-Type" => Hibari::JsonAPI::CONTENT_TYPE, "Accepts" => Hibari::JsonAPI::CONTENT_TYPE, "User-Agent" => "hibari-api/#{Hibari::VERSION}/#{Crystal::VERSION} (wopian/hibari-api)"})
JSON.parse(response.body)

instance_methods.name: table_names
instance_methods.doc: Creates a hash map of all the tables in the database
instance_methods.summary: Creates a hash map of all the tables in the database

def.name: table_names
def.body:
sql = "SELECT name FROM sqlite_master WHERE type='table';"
db.query_all(sql, as: String)

def.name: to_json
def.body:
json.object do
  _status = @status
  if _status.nil?
  else
    json.field("status") do
      _status.to_json(json)
    end
  end
  _start_date = @start_date
  if _start_date.nil?
  else
    json.field("start_date") do
      _start_date.to_json(json)
    end
  end
  _id = @id
  if _id.nil?
  else
    json.field("id") do
      _id.to_json(json)
    end
  end
  _created_at = @created_at
  if _created_at.nil?
  else
    json.field("created_at") do
      _created_at.to_json(json)
    end
  end
  _updated_at = @updated_at
  if _updated_at.nil?
  else
    json.field("updated_at") do
      _updated_at.to_json(json)
    end
  end
end

instance_methods.name: to_query_hash
instance_methods.doc: Builds a hash from all `CRECTO_FIELDS` defined

def.name: to_query_hash
def.body:
query_hash = {} of Symbol => DbValue | ArrayDbValue
if include_virtual || (@@changeset_fields.includes?(:status))
  query_hash[:status] = self.status
  if (query_hash[:status].is_a?(Time)) && (query_hash[:status].as(Time)).local?
    query_hash[:status] = (query_hash[:status].as(Time)).to_utc
  end
end
if include_virtual || (@@changeset_fields.includes?(:start_date))
  query_hash[:start_date] = self.start_date
  if (query_hash[:start_date].is_a?(Time)) && (query_hash[:start_date].as(Time)).local?
    query_hash[:start_date] = (query_hash[:start_date].as(Time)).to_utc
  end
end
query_hash[:created_at] = self.created_at.nil? ? nil : ((self.created_at.as(Time)).local? ? (self.created_at.as(Time)).to_utc : self.created_at)
query_hash[:updated_at] = self.updated_at.nil? ? nil : ((self.updated_at.as(Time)).local? ? (self.updated_at.as(Time)).to_utc : self.updated_at)
if self.id.nil?
else
  query_hash[:id] = self.id
end
query_hash

def.name: update_from_hash
def.body:
hash.each do |key, value|
  case key.to_s
  when "status"
    if value.to_s.empty?
      @status = nil
    else
      if value.to_i?
        @status = value.to_i
      end
    end
  when "start_date"
    if value.to_s.empty?
      @start_date = nil
    else
begin
        @start_date = Time.parse(value, "%F %T %z")
      end    end
  end
end

def.name: to_query_hash
def.body:
query_hash = {} of Symbol => DbValue | ArrayDbValue
if include_virtual || (@@changeset_fields.includes?(:total))
  query_hash[:total] = self.total
  if (query_hash[:total].is_a?(Time)) && (query_hash[:total].as(Time)).local?
    query_hash[:total] = (query_hash[:total].as(Time)).to_utc
  end
end
if include_virtual || (@@changeset_fields.includes?(:mean))
  query_hash[:mean] = self.mean
  if (query_hash[:mean].is_a?(Time)) && (query_hash[:mean].as(Time)).local?
    query_hash[:mean] = (query_hash[:mean].as(Time)).to_utc
  end
end
if include_virtual || (@@changeset_fields.includes?(:median))
  query_hash[:median] = self.median
  if (query_hash[:median].is_a?(Time)) && (query_hash[:median].as(Time)).local?
    query_hash[:median] = (query_hash[:median].as(Time)).to_utc
  end
end
if include_virtual || (@@changeset_fields.includes?(:mode))
  query_hash[:mode] = self.mode
  if (query_hash[:mode].is_a?(Time)) && (query_hash[:mode].as(Time)).local?
    query_hash[:mode] = (query_hash[:mode].as(Time)).to_utc
  end
end
if include_virtual || (@@changeset_fields.includes?(:variance))
  query_hash[:variance] = self.variance
  if (query_hash[:variance].is_a?(Time)) && (query_hash[:variance].as(Time)).local?
    query_hash[:variance] = (query_hash[:variance].as(Time)).to_utc
  end
end
if include_virtual || (@@changeset_fields.includes?(:standard_deviation))
  query_hash[:standard_deviation] = self.standard_deviation
  if (query_hash[:standard_deviation].is_a?(Time)) && (query_hash[:standard_deviation].as(Time)).local?
    query_hash[:standard_deviation] = (query_hash[:standard_deviation].as(Time)).to_utc
  end
end
if include_virtual || (@@changeset_fields.includes?(:anime_id))
  query_hash[:anime_id] = self.anime_id
  if (query_hash[:anime_id].is_a?(Time)) && (query_hash[:anime_id].as(Time)).local?
    query_hash[:anime_id] = (query_hash[:anime_id].as(Time)).to_utc
  end
end
query_hash[:created_at] = self.created_at.nil? ? nil : ((self.created_at.as(Time)).local? ? (self.created_at.as(Time)).to_utc : self.created_at)
query_hash[:updated_at] = self.updated_at.nil? ? nil : ((self.updated_at.as(Time)).local? ? (self.updated_at.as(Time)).to_utc : self.updated_at)
if self.id.nil?
else
  query_hash[:id] = self.id
end
query_hash

def.name: update_from_hash
def.body:
hash.each do |key, value|
  case key.to_s
  when "total"
    if value.to_s.empty?
      @total = nil
    else
      if value.to_i?
        @total = value.to_i
      end
    end
  when "mean"
    if value.to_s.empty?
      @mean = nil
    else
      if value.to_i?
        @mean = value.to_i
      end
    end
  when "median"
    if value.to_s.empty?
      @median = nil
    else
      if value.to_i?
        @median = value.to_i
      end
    end
  when "mode"
    if value.to_s.empty?
      @mode = nil
    else
      if value.to_i?
        @mode = value.to_i

def.name: to_query_hash
def.body:
query_hash = {} of Symbol => DbValue | ArrayDbValue
if include_virtual || (@@changeset_fields.includes?(:name))
  query_hash[:name] = self.name
  if (query_hash[:name].is_a?(Time)) && (query_hash[:name].as(Time)).local?
    query_hash[:name] = (query_hash[:name].as(Time)).to_utc
  end
end
if include_virtual || (@@changeset_fields.includes?(:updated_at))
  query_hash[:updated_at] = self.updated_at
  if (query_hash[:updated_at].is_a?(Time)) && (query_hash[:updated_at].as(Time)).local?
    query_hash[:updated_at] = (query_hash[:updated_at].as(Time)).to_utc
  end
end
if include_virtual || (@@changeset_fields.includes?(:created_at))
  query_hash[:created_at] = self.created_at
  if (query_hash[:created_at].is_a?(Time)) && (query_hash[:created_at].as(Time)).local?
    query_hash[:created_at] = (query_hash[:created_at].as(Time)).to_utc
  end
end
if self.id.nil?
else
  query_hash[:id] = self.id
end
query_hash

def.name: update_from_hash
def.body:
hash.each do |key, value|
  case key.to_s
  when "name"
    if value.to_s.empty?
      @name = nil
    else
      @name = value.to_s
    end
  when "updated_at"
    if value.to_s.empty?
      @updated_at = nil
    else
      @updated_at = value.to_s
    end
  when "created_at"
    if value.to_s.empty?
      @created_at = nil
    else
      @created_at = value.to_s
    end
  end
end

query_hash[:updated_at] = self.updated_at.nil? ? nil : ((self.updated_at.as(Time)).local? ? (self.updated_at.as(Time)).to_utc : self.updated_at)
if self.id.nil?
else
